name: #VoteFromHome
description:
Due to the current pandemic situation, Freedonia General Election will be held on Twitter (#VoteFromHome).

1 Follower = 1 Vote

This is the perfect time to let your influence as a political advisor change the destiny of Freedonia, but... Which candidate will you support?

Remember, the election ends on August 1st at 07:59 PM EGT.

Get involved in the future of Freedonia! All the tweets generated by the game will be published in the candidates' accounts:

  • Dustin Boquet. https://twitter.com/DustinBoquet
  • Sonya J. Mendes. https://twitter.com/SonyaJMendes

Remember that you can also support your candidate outside the game using Twitter: follow, retweet, share, discuss... Freedonia 2020 General Election is in your hands!

A game by:

  • @_WhoOne_
  • @RisinGoat
  • @ruben_oluwa

Music by:

  • La Traviata, Brindisi
    Giuseppe Verdi - MIT Symphony Orchestra
  • A Night Alone
    TrackTribe
  • PP Hymn - Emotion Version
    Manel Pacho (Wiwi Music)
